154.content:
Naruto was enjoying the sun on his face, and the sea wind in his hair.

It was several years since The war, and Naruto had taken to traveling. Much like Pervy sage before him.

Yes, including Pervy sages old hobby.

Hey, some one had to honor the old man's memory.

And Naruto was better at it anyway. Being able to hide in plain sight and all, plus the sexy Jutsu and shadow clones.

Naruto pulled himself from his memories, feeling something hit his foot with a metallic clang.

There, half buried in the sand, was something incredibly shiny.

Curious, Naruto pulled the shiny object from the sand.

Looking at it, Naruto was reminded of old stories, from far before the concept of chakra, far before the Juubi came to be and destroyed the world. When the world was split into many different land masses, instead of the elemental nations they knew.

The types of Stories the Sage had told the young Bijuu to pass the time.

It was a 'lamp', a strange name for the object. It came from a land much like Suna, but smaller and more divided. If Naruto remembered the tales correctly, the 'lamp' held a wish granting spirit, called a Genie or Djinn or something.

But, while they could grant wishes, they were also tricky. Very much so.

"Well, I've fought the creator of the world, had one piece of it stuck in my gut for most of my life, fought zombies and my family had connections to the Shinigami through a mask. Why would this be fake?" Naruto asked himself. "But what should I wish for? They can grant three wishes, right?"

Taking care not to unleash the Genie, Naruto placed it in his pocket, a seal absorbing the lamp like any ninja tool.

So, for days and days and days, turning into weeks and weeks, Naruto thought. He tried to recall every story, every wish gone wrong. He tried to remember what happened to the people who fell prey to the Djinn's tricks.

And, when he had recalled every last scrap of Info, he thought on what he wanted from life. What did he want? What sounded good?

Well, he always did want a travelling companion. And while he might not have wanted to live forever, he wanted to keep watch over the world. Just because this war had ended on good terms, didn't mean that the future would be more of the same.

So, maybe Immortality would be fine for that purpose...

Eh, he'd think of the third wish on the spot.

So, coming to a clearing in the forest he was in, Naruto set up camp. He took his time, hunting and cooking some dinner.

After his meal, Naruto brought out the lamp for the first time in weeks.

"How was it that they unleashed the genie again?" Naruto mused, absent-mindedly rubbing his thumb over the side of the lamp.

A wisp of smoke started rising from the spout of the lamp, a bluish smoke, thick as well. It flowed unseen, and unnaturally for that matter, behind Naruto, collecting into the form of something human.

Pretty hot, female one as well.

"Hello, Master." She said, making Naruto spin around in surprise.

"Holy shit!" Naruto yells, summoning a kunai to his hand.

Only to stop in surprise.

The woman looked exactly like his sexy jutsu!

Well, not exactly. There were a few minor cosmetic differences, after all.

Bluish grey smoke wafted around her feet, not very much either. She had long, blue lines running along her body, much like Shukaku did. Her eyes looked like they were made of smoke, billowing inside small glass jewels. Her hair was also very floaty, the end of her pig-tails not so much ending as fading into the air.

Oh, and she was buck naked.

"I must say, you are the first person to find me in Ages. Not a bad looker either." She said, licking her lips as she eyed him up and down.

"Who are you?" Naruto asked, keeping the lamp firmly in hand.

The woman laughed. "Why, I'm the genie of that lamp you hold. And, because you hold it, you are my master. For three wishes, that is. Once you use those, I'll disappear again." She said, floating over to him. She left a smoky trail in her wake, flowers blooming in the wake of it.

She trailed a few fingers across his chest, uncovered to dry his shirt out.

"So... What is it that you desire, my most handsome master?" She asked, batting her eyes at him.

"Well, first off, I would like Immortality..."

The genie scowled. "Another one of them are you? Fine." She said, snapping her fingers. "Stupid arrogant pricks. Every time someone finds me, It's something like this. What's next, infinite wealth?"

Naruto scowled back at her. "Now hold up a minute. There's a reason behind my Immortality, and I don't think the reason is all that selfish."

"Yeah yeah, I've heard that before." She said, waving her hand. "Next wish? I would like to hurry up and get back to my lamp now."

"You know, I was just going to wish for a traveling companion next, to help stave off the boredom..."

*pop*

A fox appeared next to the camp fire, sleeping soundly.

"That's two." She said, smirking. "You said 'I' and 'Wish' in the same sentence, so It's good enough for me. So, travelling companion. Be glad it's a fox and not something stupid like a toad."

"I resent that, since some of my best friends are toads." Naruto said. She was really pissing him off!

"Well sooorrry." The Djinn said, not even trying to hide the sarcasm in her voice. "Any way, last wish?"

Naruto growled. Someone needed to put this girl in her place, magic reality warping powers or no.

You know what? I'm tired of you already. Acting like this over me trying to make sure I'm around to make sure the world doesn't kill itself. I'm not like some mad men, so don't lump me with them."

The genie scoffed. "Yeah, right. All you assholes are alike."

"That's it!" Naruto said, slamming the cup of water in his hand on the ground. "Fine! You think I can be like on of them? I'll show you just how bad I can be compared to them. I wish you were bound to serve me until the day I die, with nothing but joy and happiness at that fact!"

The Genie stopped, going wide eyed in shock. "Y-you what?"

"You heard me." Naruto all but growled out.

"No..." She whispered out, her eyes starting to fill with tears. She felt her arm raising, against her will. "No!" She cried, trying to push the arm back down. "I don't want to do this!"

*Snap*

And everything for this girl changed.

Because she messed with the wrong man, and was a total bitch.

All she had ever done throughout the millennia's she had served, she had tortured those who happened upon her lamp. All poor shmucks, falling prey to her wiles. She took away their decency, or set them on fire, or otherwise made people regret finding her.

But now she messed with Naruto Uzumaki.

She had seen him, seen his heart, ever since he picked up her lamp. She had seen that his heart was relatively pure, compared to most other people who found her lamp/

So, with every wish she granted, she reversed the purity into corruption.

The old Naruto was no more.

This new Naruto was going to be ten times worse the Jiryia, if not a hundred.

And he was her permanent master, and she was his happy little slave, now and forever more.

Oh yes, she messed with the wrong man.

And this man just had to have had perverts and lechers for teachers.
154.title: Tricking the djinn bitch

choices: "Back to when the Juubi created the world!" Rewrite world history from the start
"The time of the Sage of Six Paths!" Shape the Ninja world's growth
"Back to my Birth!" Change his life, with the Djinn as his caretaker for 5 years
1543.content:
"Come here." Naruto ordered, pointing to a spot in front of him.

The Djinn version of his sexy Jutsu nodded, smiling, and floated directly to that spot, not one inch out of place. She stood... floated directly in front of him, letting him get an eyeful of her nude body.

"Name?" Naruto demanded, looking her up and down. Even if she was based on his sexy jutsu, she got it in great detail, and her own cosmetic changes were nice as well. He took his time ogling her form, wondering if she was capable of certain... 'activities.'

"I don't have one, Master." She said, still happy. "If it pleases you, you can call me whatever you want."

Naruto hummed in thought. "Perhaps, if I so desire." He said, tracing the blue tattoo lines with a hand, being none too shy about touching her anywhere. "Tell me, what are the extent of your powers?"

"Almost anything and everything Master." She said, still smiling dreamily as he traced his hand over her breasts. The smoke around her feet gained a shape of pink to it, probably signaling her arousal. "I cannot kill someone, nor can I return people from the dead, nor can I force love."

"But there are loopholes, I take it? Like what I have done with you?"

She nodded. "Yes, my master. You are the first person to ever think to order a Djinn to become their permanent servant. Most people either paid it no mind, or they were told that such a thing was impossible. That is why we Djinn try to explain the rules first, to try and slip that fact in." She said.

Naruto traced his hand around her crotch, feeling a strange sensation. It was not unlike a woman's arousal, but it appeared to be the Djinn counterpart, being a heavy, somehow wet-feeling smoke.

The Djinn moaned softly, the tips of her hair catching fire. It was pink, and her body seemed to tinge the same shade, even her eyes. "Does my body please you master?"

Naruto smirked. So, even Djinn felt pleasure, eh? "Yes it does. A good form you have here."

"I base them around the current holder of my lamp, but always a female version. If the holder of my lamp is already female, I become a more beautiful version of them. I did this to incite lust or jealousy." She said, moaning in slight disappointment as naruto pulled away, but she put a lid on that. If he wanted to tease her, it was his right to do so, and she would have to accept it.

"Tell me something. Compared to the Juubi, how powerful are you?"

"The Juubi, as you call it, is nothing compared to even the weakest Djinn. The Juubi may have created the world, but we Djinn have our lot in creating the universe." She said, still tinged pink.

"You're not saying that out of pride, are you?"

"No Master. We Djinn have been around for far, far longer then this world. But, for such a great task, our power was sealed by our leaders. They understood what we could do to the people with our full might."

"Case in point, you." Naruto said.

"Indeed." She said, having not moved an inch.

Naruto sat down, thinking on what he could do with this. He had a powerful servant at his disposal, willing to do anything he said. What couldn't he do?

"How many of your kind are there?"

"Two hundred and seventy eight. That number never rises or falls, for we Djinn are eternal."

"And where do you rank in power? And answer me truthfully."

"I rank 37th in terms of power Master." She said.

Naruto leaned back against the fallen log he had used as a seat before. "So that would mean that there are only thirty six that could challenge you. Tell me, are all the Djinn sealed away like you, even the leaders?"

"Yes Master. Every single one of us Djinn are sealed away, even the leaders. We are all bound by the same rules I am. Three wishes, no killing, n-"

"I get it." Naruto said. "Come sit on my lap." He ordered.

The Djinn nodded, floating over to him. She took a seating position in the air over him, lowering herself onto his lap.

"Does this please you Master?" She asked.

"Yes." Naruto said, running his hands along her body again. It was strange, having solid smoke sitting in your lap. It looked like flesh, but it didn't feel right. He didn't pass through it, but it was very soft.

Naruto took his time, tracing the lines of her body again. "What would you say to going back in time? Is such a thing possible?"

"Incredibly so Master." She said, keeping a moan at bay. Her hair was alight with the pink fire.

"Would I keep the knowledge I have, and you?" He asked, not wanting to risk losing such a grand Prize.

"If you so wished it, I could assure it." She said, biting her lip as his hand dipped to her lower lips.

"Hmm... yes. That sounds like a good idea. I can wish the power I have now back at any point. Knowledge and you would Suffice. Is there any limit to how far back I can go?"

"None Master. You could go back to the founding of the universe, if you so wished it. But I do not know how my fellow Djinn would react to you."

Naruto nodded, pulling his hand from her honey pot. It was... Covered, was that the right word... in the heavy, wet smoke. It rolled away from his hand slowly, dispersing into the air.

"That sounds good then. To go back in time."

"Very good Master." She said, biting back a moan as he caressed her breasts from behind. "Just say the magic words to allow me the use of my power. Even still, it is still sealed away."

Naruto nodded. "You're being very helpful. That's good. You may even earn a reward." He said huskily.

The Djinn smiled even wider. "Thank you Master, for your kindness."

Naruto grinned lustfully. He had an idea of where to go, and what to do. But one last thing he had to know.

"If I were to change history, such as my parents never meeting, what would happen to me?"

"Nothing would happen to you Master. Changing history is like switching blankets, if you will. The other does not cease existing, it is merely stored away. And since you would be the one changing the blanket, you would be unaffected by it."

Naruto nodded. Good.

"Alright then. I wish to go back in time, retaining everything I own at this moment, including both my knowledge and you." He said.

Light started to emanate from the Djinn in his lap, as everything around them started to blur.

"When would you like to go Master?"
1543.title: Time for questions, and a life-changing wish

choices: The child, watching the world grow around her.
An adult, pleasing on the eyes until he thinks the human race should be born.
15431.content:
Naruto grinned. "Take me to the beginning of the world! When the Juubi was a mere sapling instead of the tree it is today."

The Djinn smiled, nodding. "As you wish it, so it shall be." She said, a bright light covering the entire planet. The light show was proportional to how much energy she needed to use.

Naruto, from his bubble of time, watched as the world hit rewind on its growth. Trees regressed, mountain shrank and rocks rolled up hill. Sand became rock and rock became boulder. People deaged and grew young, the dead coming back to life in mockery of the Shinigami's work.

Naruto even saw himself, as he was moments before, following the reversed time flow.

That was a head trip, Naruto could say with a definite understanding of the concept. Not that it deterred him from his course.

He saw history, all rewinding back to this one spot.

A seed, in the vast cosmic ocean that everyone looked up at in the sky, wondering what their purpose was.

The Djinn's light faded, sitting on his lap even still.

"So that's the Juubi huh?" Naruto, looking at the little seed.

"Yes Master." She said. "That is the Juubi. In a few moments, it will sprout, and the planet you called home will form."

"Yes. And I will shape it." Naruto said. "A planet filled with women, the Juubi being my personal pet. Just like you."

"Yes Master." The Djinn said.

"Take that, you Uchiha bastards." Naruto said with a smirk. He had done what Madara or Obito could never do, could only dream of.

Well, would do. But it still stood.

A little crack appeared in the seed, intense light coming from the tiny thing.

"It's starting Master." The Djinn said as Naruto leaned forward.

A little sprout poked out of the seed, green in a cosmos of endless night, merely the light of stars providing enough to cause this tree of life to grow.

And with that sprout, came the world.

Roots spread from the seed, creating earth to latch onto, expanding to match the size of the world Naruto knew as home. The roots themselves created the earth, springs of water flowing from the seed into the dry packed dirt, which in turn flowed right back into the seed, causing it to grow and give more water.

The water grew in quantities, growing from ponds to lakes to seas, until finally it was several oceans worth, all nourishing one tiny, yet powerful seed. The roots grew and receded, creating the mountains and caves, raising large land masses, though none by themselves as large as the elemental nations. But there was more land, definitely.

The seed grew, from a little sprout to a sapling, to a young healthy tree to a mighty, towering beast in its own right. As if grew, it's branches flowered, blooming into flowers and leaves of all kinds. When these fell, they became animals of all kinds, some that Naruto had never thought possible. These animals were giants, easily the size of Gamabunta or the Bijuu. They roamed the earth, starting the cycle of life and evolution.

The roots grew, some exposed to the surface, creating forests with their moss.

Around the great tree, the weather was a catastrophe, snowing and hailing and cloudy and sunny all at once. The winds raged from its boughs, scattering more and more of the leaves, creating more and more of these fantastical beasts.

And then, it all went calm.

The tree of life had sprouted, done its job in creating the world.

It was truly a sight to have beheld.

"Amazing." Naruto said. Even as he was, it was breathtaking, an awe inspiring experience.

Especially for something with no active intelligence.

"Do you think you could give the tree a human body?" He asked the Djinn.

"Easily Master." She said, smiling.

"I'm thinking a child, impressionable like one. That way I could shape her growth. I would rather not Depend on your power for everything." He said, rubbing a hand down the Djinn's side.

"I could do that for you Master. Anything you want, if it is within my power to do so. Just wish for it, and it shall be yours." She said, moving them closer to the world tree.

As they got closer, Naruto thought of his options. What all could he do with the tree? A child yes, but what about a fully grown woman with the mind of a child? Just as easily impressionable, but more pleasing on the eyes.

Should he give it a more human mind, or one like a wild beast?

Well, either way he's going to be the father of the human race. Only one takes time for her to grow, the other doesn't. Both will take time for him to sculpt her mind to his liking though, since he liked a challenge. Which one, which one...
15431.title: Birth of a world.

154312.content:
As Naruto stared at the sapling he remembered how powerful and outrageously dangerous it became in the future. 1551.content:
Let it be said that the world can be quite strange, no matter how you look at it. From the perspective of an outsider looking in, or an insider, who's view of the world is shaped by her experiences in it. There will always be a certain mystery to it, no matter how long you live, or how much you see.

This world had one Mystery that no one cared about solving, yet was plain as day to everyone.

Naruto Uzumaki.

The only male on the planet.

The only male to ever be on the planet.

It was a strange thing, Naruto Uzumaki.

He was considered a god among mortal women, for death never seemed to accept him.

Who knew how many lives he had lived, born again and again, from birth till death, walking the endless wheel of life eternally.

But Naruto never knew, until he was told.

Innocent as a new born babe should have been, with no knowledge of his previous life at all.

It was him that fathered every generation, and it was he who sowed the fields for human life in the beginning.

And the mother who bore him was considered a goddess until her dying day.

No matter what happened to Naruto, he would always be born again. Even if still a child, though the women he grew up with tried to prevent that, he would always be born again, some random woman pregnant with his new form.

That was not all however. Wherever he was born was declared a holy place until his death, repeating in a cycle. Disputes were laid to rest on this ground, and it was often that wars ended wherever he had been born last.

He always looked the same, whenever he grew from a boy to a man. Women everywhere fell to his charms, primal lust springing forth just by his mere presence. It wasn't just for the survival of the human race either that they felt these feelings, but the legendary pleasure he could give to a woman was something to behold, it was said.

Yes, Naruto Uzumaki was a mysterious case in the strange world. One that no one wanted to truly solve, for he might just vanish if they did, the mystery itself to their lives gone.

And we begin our story with his birth. Well, another of them anyway.
1551.title: The first man, the only man.

15511.content:
The Naruto that is born this day is one of the many in this era, and the third to be born in Konoha. The past two were the first and third Hokage. But the first Naruto was given the name Asura, for he was benevolent, but a major trickster, like the ancient god. Many were born since that time, across the world.

This Naruto Uzumaki was born as the son of the fourth Hokage, Mina Namikaze, and her wife Kushina. Kushina was the one miraculously pregnant, like those that came before her. She was honored like those before with the last name Uzumaki. Kushina gave birth to Naruto just outside Konoha.

Naruto was born a crying baby in the presence of his mothers. And what happened next was a fascinating site: Asura's immortal pet fox, Kurami, came and stayed with Naruto for the rest of his life like she did with all the others before.

This Naruto was chosen to be the godson of Miraiya, a sage and sanin. When the individuals return to the village, there is a major celebration and festival throughout.

Naruto grew up in a loving family, but the attention he got throughout the village as a little boy left him shy and timid. He would dress in clothes that covered every detail of himself so people didn't know who he was. This is the first time a Naruto was so shy.

He enrolled at the academy like most the girls. He never asked why he was the only boy in the village though. Although he did slack off to be a "Dead Last" in class, but he did do good in school. He made friends with several girls in school.

Satsuki Uchiha, the youngest of the Uchiha clan. Shini Aburame, the only girl who likes bugs. Cho Akimichi, the fattest girl in school. Sakura Haruno, a girl Naruto actually liked. Hinata Hyuga, a girl with a similar personality.

Niji Hyuga, Hinata's cousin who had a love-hate relationship with Hinata. Kira Inuzuka, a girl who is very short tempered. Stone Lee, a truly hyperactive girl. Shikamari Nara, the smartest and laziest girl in school. Tenten, a tomboy. And Ino Yamanaka, a tad vain girl.

Naruto also became friends with his teacher, Iruki Umino. Then came the day he was to graduate from the academy.

155111.content:
It's been twelve years since Naruto was reborn. Naruto only had a few friends, but he always struggled in school on one thing: The Clone Jutsu. He always tried to suck up to Sensei Iruki and Sensei Miziki by taking them out for Ramen at this giant restaurant with his parents. Afterwards, we all left for home, but Sensei Miziki got him alone and told him about the scroll of seals in the hokage office.

He goes to the office with his mom's keys and get the scrolls quite easily. He goes into the forest and starts practicing with the Shadow Clone Jutsu. Sensei Iruki finds him exhausted from practice. He says that Miziki would help him graduate if he learnt a technique. Miziki then attacks with knives and hit Iruki in the knees. Miziki and Iruki get into an argument. It ends with Miziki yelling, "Either give me the scroll or the only man, your choice!"

Miziki then looks at Naruto's shocked face and said, "Shocked? Nobody told you? Good! Now you know that you've lived for thousands of years!" Naruto just fled. But then he stopped himself and turned around. He now has rage in his eyes. Miziki then says, "Oh, so you want to die and start all over?" Naruto then said, "If you hurt my Sensei, I'll kill you!"

Naruto then used the perfected Shadow Clone Jutsu. Using hundreds of clones to beat up Miziki. Iruki then says, "You know what...You're graduated!" As she puts her headband onto Naruto. The next day, Naruto had a complete personality change. He was now more outgoing and started wearing the clothing that he's known for wearing and lets his spiky hair out. He then goes and spray paints the whole village with graffiti.

He then goes and turns in his goofy ID picture to his mom. At that moment, someone tried to throw a Shuriken at Mina, but fell on her face. The girl is named Konoha, granddaughter of the third Hokage. She follows Naruto around and when Naruto decides to confront her, she asks, "Are you really my grandpa?" Naruto decides to let her follow him around. They hang out everywhere.

At the end of the day, Konoha then asks, "Do you think I can be Hokage?" Naruto asks about the question and Konoha said, "Well, grandpa, or you, named me after this village. But everyone only calls me the Hokage's granddaughter. I want people to say my real name by being Hokage." Naruto then said, "Just know that there aren't any shortcuts, practice. I should know."
155111.title: Miziki offers 'help'

1551111.content:
(First Person Perspective of Naruto) I awake in the mourning to my mom, Mina, making breakfast. Halfway through the breakfast, I ask, "Where's mom?" And she says, "Oh, she just went on another of her celebration trips. You know, the one for giving birth to you every year?" I then drink some milk and head off. I then hear about the teams.

I'm going to be paired up with Satsuki and Sakura. A little while later, we then wait for our Jonin Sensei to meet us. She's very late and makes us wait. Then Kakishi finally arrives. We all start off by telling stories about ourselves and our dreams. Kakishi said little to nothing, I spoke of a dream to be Hokage, Sakura just giggled in the corner, and Satsuki said she wants to beat her older sister.

We then go off on an examination where we have to take two bells from her. During the examination, I charge at her, and accidentally cop a feel. She retaliated with the thousand years of death, or a finger up the butt that shot me into a lake. Long story short, even though we didn't get the bells, we did pass. But we did no new mission
1551111.title: Team Making Day

1553.title: Yet another, sadly

15531.content:
Naruto moaned and groaned as he felt the five fingers touch his belly. Sakura stared in horror as Sasuke just helpless. Naruto then had his eyes roll back as the flames on Orochimaru's finger tips turned pink instead. From his belly came a cloud of smoke as a giant claw flew from his body.

Orochimaru screamed with a female voice as he leaped back. Landing he saw the giant Fox roar as the smoke had a wave hit everything and everyone. Sasuke flew back into a tree as Sakura just hit the ground more. From the back off the Fox appeared a cloud of smoke. Standing on the Fox's back was Minato as he said looking down, "Looks like someone ruptured the seal. Time to seal the fox again and take care of whoever did this."
15531.title: Event plus Flash Foward

info.brief_description: Naruto is the last male on earth. Now every girl wants a piece of him.
info.description:
For one reason or another -- whether because of, say, a virus that wipes out the world’s male population, or a jutsu that turns all men into girls, or a sadistic goddess that renders all other men sterile/impotent/eunuchs -- Naruto Uzumaki is now the only fertile man left in a world full of women.

All those girls who may have before said of Naruto “Not even if he was the last man on earth” are now forced to eat their words (and his dick) for the sake of ensuring a new generation, and the continued survival of the human race. Luckily for all, there is plenty of Naruto to go around...

***

Other stuff you may also be interested in, if you like this:

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1939418-Sokkas-Harem

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1901170-Hayate-Hypno-Harem

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1954148-Mating-Season-Beast-Boy-in-...

***

Okay, now before getting let’s lay down some ground rules:

1. Naruto is the only male. Whether it is because all other males are dead, or turned into women, or whatever, Naruto Uzumaki is the only sexually viable male in this interactive (with, ostensibly, the exception of any boys he may father.

2. Nothing needlessly violent. Specifically, no torture or snuff porn, though bloodplay may be acceptable to a reasonable degree. This is an interactive for passionate orgies and sexual fun, so try to stay on track. And as a corollary

2a. No rape. Considering the sort of interactive this is, of course, there may be some gray areas, but if Naruto is violently forcing himself on girls and seriously abusing them, then that is NOT OKAY. That said, surprise sex and... coerced consent are acceptable, for our purposes. But if she hasn’t said yes (or otherwise displayed signs of wanting it, on some level), then it is not okay.

3. On minors... Lolicon, to a reasonable extent, is acceptable(in the story, that is -- in real life of course it is wrong, as statutory rape is, for legal purposes, no better than regular rape). To a reasonable extent being the key word, here. There’s no specific line on what age is too young, perhaps, but for the purposes of this story, if they are old enough to get periods, then they are old enough. I won’t exactly dissuade you from aiming a bit younger, of course, but for a general rule of thumb: if they are too young to talk, they are too young. Period.

4. Gender-bending. Naturally, since one of the potential premises for this story is that all men have been turned into girls, female versions of canonically male characters are for our purposes as good as natural-born girls. (Though if you give the gender-bent characters new, female names, try to at least make them recognizable. Example: Choji becoming Cho, or Shino becoming Shiko.)

4a. Futanari/Hermaphrodites. Somewhat relatedly, you are allowed to introduce hermaphrodite or futanari characters (or turn existing characters into ones), so long as you follow these conditions: 1., they cannot impregnate anyone (would sorta defeat the point of the story, though they can become pregnant themselves), and 2., they use their dicks only on females or fellow hermaphrodites -- that is, Naruto can penetrate them, but preferably THEY would not be penetrating HIM unless it’s very well done or otherwise somehow justified via “plot”.

5. Pregnancy. Since this is ostensibly about Naruto being the only man left capable of fathering a new generation (preferably via hot and steamy sex with all kinds of lovely, nubile ladies), it is natural that characters will get pregnant and have kids. This is fine, and perhaps even encouraged the further down a storyline you get. And if you let the kids grow up (whether via a timeskip or some sort of plot magic that lets them rapidly mature up to a certain point) and decide you want them to participate in some fun sexy times, then sure, that’s fine. Whether it’s sons fucking their sisters or mothers or stepmothers (boys fathered by Naruto are accepted as the chief and probably sole exception to the “Naruto is the only male” rule) or daughters fucking their brothers or father, this is all fine. As long as you don’t make it outstandingly creepy (and I have a high tolerance for such stuff, so this caveat probably won’t be invoked unless you deliberately go out of your way to do so).

6. Quality and quantity. If you are going to make an addition to the story, please make sure the chapter you are submitting is legible. Make use of the enter button to put proper spaces between paragraphs so that your chapter doesn't wind up as an impenetrable wall of text. Additionally, if you are going to be adding a lot of single-sentence choice chapters, please try to also contribute chapters with actual content. Even if it isn’t exactly a masterpiece, as long as it’s readable and not a clusterfuck of misspellings and awful formatting, any contribution is appreciated.

Of course, after saying all of that, I would like to say that these rules are not NECESSARILY set in stone. If you write it well enough, or manage to justify it story-or-plot-wise, then I will gladly make an exception, because I am flexible like that. Hoho.

But that is quite enough ado about nothing! Let us away with the story.
